channel.title: Banned? wha?
channel.description: Ok so this is the problem me and the owner of reaperscape have been pissed bout this for a long time because when i try to log onto his server it says im banned, and he searched all the file and in banned handler was my ip so he deleted it and it still says im banned he checked every file again and its nothing there. Can someone please help?EDIT: oh and i know that it has to do with my ip because it worked on another computer.

item.title: Banned? wha?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

Hey my source is the best out there. I’m Owner Reaper, the owner of ReaperScape and ReaperScape PK. This is my friend that can’t logg into my computer, he’s Mod Wii (gonna be Admin Wii) and he really needs help. I dunno what it is. I have 3 different things to ban ip style. There is this ban handeler, a console that ip bans, this old banning thing, and the old fashion of ::ipban which works too. but when i search everywhere his ip doesn show saying that its iether his computer ip or something… i’m not sure so plz help and STOP TELLING ME TO CHANGE MY SOURCE, lol…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2007, 08:41:49 AM[/size][hr][quote=“3_hit___u, post:5, topic:77191”]isen’t this wrong sec.?[/quote]I really have no idea, my frined posted it here, but it does say, MoparScape Question so it sohuld be in the right section
